languages.text: "Тот рейд был скомпрометирован: врага предупредили об операции. Мы оказались в западне. Какой-то мутант решил отгрызть мне руку — это была ошибка. Освободиться я не мог, пришлось протолкнуть предплечье в осклизлое горло, ухватиться за рыхлое нутро и прикрыться выродком, как щитом. Пока тварь хрустела моими костями, и окатывала меня ихором и моей собственной кровью, я поливал огнем других мутантов. Вот такой небольшой маневр, который выиграл моему отряду несколько решающих секунд".

"That raid I mentioned was compromised. The enemy had been tipped off to our operation, and we had walked into a trap. Some mutant decided to chew my arm off. That was a mistake: since I couldn't free myself, I pushed my hand down his throat, grabbed something inside, and used him as a shield. While the thing was gnawing on my bones and spraying me with ichor and my own blood, I opened fire on the rest of the scum. That little manoeuvre bought my unit a few critical seconds."

Вот такой небольшой маневр, который выиграл моему отряду несколько решающих секунд".

traits.locale_text: "That raid was compromised. The enemy had been tipped off to our operation, and we had walked into a trap. Some mutant decided to chew my arm off. That was a mistake: since I couldn't free myself, I pushed my hand down his throat, grabbed something inside, and used him as a shield. While that thing was gnawing on my bones and spraying me with ichor and my own blood, I opened fire on the rest of the scum. That little manoeuvre bought my unit a few critical seconds."

That was a mistake: since I couldn't free myself, I pushed my hand down his throat, grabbed something inside, and used him as a shield. While the thing was gnawing on my bones and spraying me with ichor and my own blood, I opened fire on the rest of the scum. That little manoeuvre bought my unit a few critical seconds."

languages.text: 「さっき言った襲撃作戦は、情報が漏れていました。敵は私たちの作戦を事前に知っていて、私たちはまんまと罠にはまり込んでしまったんです。ある変異体が私の腕にかじりついて離しませんでした。それが奴の失敗でした。私は腕を引き抜けなかったから、逆に手を奴の喉奥まで突っ込んで、体内の何かを掴み、そのまま盾として利用しました。骨をかじられ、体液や自分の血を浴びながら、残りのクズどもに銃撃を浴びせました。その一手で、私の部隊は数秒の決定的な時間を稼ぐことができたのです」
languages.original_text: "That raid I mentioned was compromised. The enemy had been tipped off to our operation, and we had walked into a trap. Some mutant decided to chew my arm off. That was a mistake: since I couldn't free myself, I pushed my hand down his throat, grabbed something inside, and used him as a shield. While the thing was gnawing on my bones and spraying me with ichor and my own blood, I opened fire on the rest of the scum. That little manoeuvre bought my unit a few critical seconds."

traits.locale_text: 「さっき言った襲撃作戦は、情報が漏れていました。敵は私たちの作戦を事前に知っていて、私たちはまんまと罠にはまり込んでしまったんです。ある変異体が私の腕にかじりついて離しませんでした。それが奴の失敗でした。私は腕を引き抜けなかったから、逆に手を奴の喉奥まで突っ込んで、体内の何かを掴み、そのまま盾として利用しました。骨をかじられ、体液や自分の血を浴びながら、残りのクズどもに銃撃を浴びせました。その一手で、私の部隊は数秒の決定的な時間を稼ぐことができたのです」

languages.text: "Der Angriff, von dem ich sprach, ging schief. Der Feind war über unsere Operation informiert worden, und wir waren in eine Falle getappt. Irgendein Mutant beschloss, mir den Arm abzubeißen. Das war ein Fehler: Da ich mich nicht befreien konnte, stieß ich ihm meine Hand in den Hals, packte zu und benutzte ihn als Schild. Während das Ding an meinen Knochen nagte und mich mit Wundsekret und meinem eigenen Blut bespritzte, eröffnete ich das Feuer auf den Rest des Abschaums. Das kleine Manöver verschaffte meiner Einheit einige entscheidende Sekunden."
languages.original_text: "That raid I mentioned was compromised. The enemy had been tipped off to our operation, and we had walked into a trap. Some mutant decided to chew my arm off. That was a mistake: since I couldn't free myself, I pushed my hand down his throat, grabbed something inside, and used him as a shield. While the thing was gnawing on my bones and spraying me with ichor and my own blood, I opened fire on the rest of the scum. That little manoeuvre bought my unit a few critical seconds."

traits.locale_text: "Der Angriff, von dem ich sprach, ging schief. Der Feind war über unsere Operation informiert worden, und wir waren in eine Falle getappt. Irgendein Mutant beschloss, mir den Arm abzubeißen. Das war ein Fehler: Da ich mich nicht befreien konnte, stieß ich ihm meine Hand in den Hals, packte zu und benutzte ihn als Schild. Während das Ding an meinen Knochen nagte und mich mit Wundsekret und meinem eigenen Blut bespritzte, eröffnete ich das Feuer auf den Rest des Abschaums. Das kleine Manöver verschaffte meiner Einheit einige entscheidende Sekunden."

languages.text: « L'assaut que j'ai mentionné avait été compromis. L'ennemi avait été averti de notre opération et nous avait tendu une embuscade. Un mutant a décidé de m'arracher le bras de ses dents. C'était une erreur : comme je n'étais pas en mesure de me libérer, j'ai enfoncé ma main dans sa gorge, j'ai trouvé une prise et l'ai utilisé comme un bouclier vivant. Pendant que cette chose continuait de me mâcher et répandant partout de l'ichor et mon propre sang, j'ai ouvert le feu sur le reste de ces vermines. Cette petite manœuvre a permis à mon unité de bénéficier de quelques secondes de répit, nous évitant le pire. »
languages.original_text: "That raid I mentioned was compromised. The enemy had been tipped off to our operation, and we had walked into a trap. Some mutant decided to chew my arm off. That was a mistake: since I couldn't free myself, I pushed my hand down his throat, grabbed something inside, and used him as a shield. While the thing was gnawing on my bones and spraying me with ichor and my own blood, I opened fire on the rest of the scum. That little manoeuvre bought my unit a few critical seconds."

traits.locale_text: « L'assaut que j'ai mentionné avait été compromis. L'ennemi avait été averti de notre opération et nous avait tendu une embuscade. Un mutant a décidé de m'arracher le bras de ses dents. C'était une erreur : comme je n'étais pas en mesure de me libérer, j'ai enfoncé ma main dans sa gorge, j'ai trouvé une prise et l'ai utilisé comme un bouclier vivant. Pendant que cette chose continuait de me mâcher et répandant partout de l'ichor et mon propre sang, j'ai ouvert le feu sur le reste de ces vermines. Cette petite manœuvre a permis à mon unité de bénéficier de quelques secondes de répit, nous évitant le pire. »

languages.text: «La redada de la que hablaba se había visto comprometida. Alguien avisó al enemigo de la operación, y nos metimos de cabeza en una emboscada. Un mutante decidió arrancarme el brazo de un mordisco. Aquello fue un error: como me vi incapaz de zafarme, opté por meterle la mano por la garganta, lo agarré con fuerza por dentro y lo usé como escudo humano literal. Mientras la abominación me roía los huesos del brazo y me rociaba con sus fluidos y mi propia sangre, yo abrí fuego contra el resto de aquella escoria. Gracias a aquella maniobra, el resto de mi unidad dispuso de unos segundos muy preciados».
languages.original_text: "That raid I mentioned was compromised. The enemy had been tipped off to our operation, and we had walked into a trap. Some mutant decided to chew my arm off. That was a mistake: since I couldn't free myself, I pushed my hand down his throat, grabbed something inside, and used him as a shield. While the thing was gnawing on my bones and spraying me with ichor and my own blood, I opened fire on the rest of the scum. That little manoeuvre bought my unit a few critical seconds."

traits.locale_text: «La redada de la que hablaba se había visto comprometida. Alguien avisó al enemigo de la operación, y nos metimos de cabeza en una emboscada. Un mutante decidió arrancarme el brazo de un mordisco. Aquello fue un error: como me vi incapaz de zafarme, opté por meterle la mano por la garganta, lo agarré con fuerza por dentro y lo usé como escudo humano literal. Mientras la abominación me roía los huesos del brazo y me rociaba con sus fluidos y mi propia sangre, yo abrí fuego contra el resto de aquella escoria. Gracias a aquella maniobra, el resto de mi unidad dispuso de unos segundos muy preciados».

languages.text: “那场突袭行动失败了，敌人早已得到我们准备行动的密报，我们落入了他们的陷阱。那个时候，某个变种人打算咬掉我的胳膊，而那是个致命的错误。当时我无法挣脱，便把手塞进了他的喉咙，抓住了肚子里什么东西，把他当成盾牌来用。那个该死的渣滓啃着我的骨头，喷得我满身都是脓液和我自己的血，而我趁着这个机会，朝其他渣滓开火。这个小小的战术动作，为我的队伍赢得了关键的几秒钟。”
languages.original_text: "That raid I mentioned was compromised. The enemy had been tipped off to our operation, and we had walked into a trap. Some mutant decided to chew my arm off. That was a mistake: since I couldn't free myself, I pushed my hand down his throat, grabbed something inside, and used him as a shield. While the thing was gnawing on my bones and spraying me with ichor and my own blood, I opened fire on the rest of the scum. That little manoeuvre bought my unit a few critical seconds."

traits.locale_text: “那场突袭行动失败了，敌人早已得到我们准备行动的密报，我们落入了他们的陷阱。那个时候，某个变种人打算咬掉我的胳膊，而那是个致命的错误。当时我无法挣脱，便把手塞进了他的喉咙，抓住了肚子里什么东西，把他当成盾牌来用。那个该死的渣滓啃着我的骨头，喷得我满身都是脓液和我自己的血，而我趁着这个机会，朝其他渣滓开火。这个小小的战术动作，为我的队伍赢得了关键的几秒钟。”

languages.text: "Sözünü ettiğim o baskın açığa çıktı. Düşman, operasyonumuz hakkında istihbarat edinince bize tuzak kurmuştu. Mutantın teki kolumu çiğnemeye başladı. Çok büyük bir hata yapıp kendimi de kurtaramadığım için elimi boğazından aşağı soktum, elime gelen şeyi tuttum... Sonra o yaratığı kalkanım olarak kullandım. O şey kemiklerimi kemirip beni irin ve kendi kanımla boğarken diğer aşağılık yaratıklara ateş açtım. O küçük hamle, birliğime birkaç kritik saniye kazandırdı."
languages.original_text: "That raid I mentioned was compromised. The enemy had been tipped off to our operation, and we had walked into a trap. Some mutant decided to chew my arm off. That was a mistake: since I couldn't free myself, I pushed my hand down his throat, grabbed something inside, and used him as a shield. While the thing was gnawing on my bones and spraying me with ichor and my own blood, I opened fire on the rest of the scum. That little manoeuvre bought my unit a few critical seconds."

traits.locale_text: "Sözünü ettiğim o baskın açığa çıktı. Düşman operasyonumuz hakkında istihbarat edinmiş, bize tuzak kurmuşlardı. Bir mutant kolumu çiğnemeye başladı. Çok büyük bir hata yapıp kendimi de kurtaramadığım için elimi boğazından aşağı soktum, elime gelen şeyi tuttum, sonra o yaratığı kalkanım olarak kullandım. O şey kemiklerimi kemirip beni irin ve kendi kanımla boğarken diğer aşağılık yaratıklara ateş açtım. O küçük hamle, birliğime birkaç kritik saniye kazandırdı."

That was a mistake: since I couldn't free myself, I pushed my hand down his throat, grabbed something inside, and used him as a shield. While the thing was gnawing on my bones and spraying me with ichor and my own blood, I opened fire on the rest of the scum. That little maneuver bought my unit a few critical seconds."
